name: Old School Driving in Car: Free Play Racing Game
name_original: Old School Driving in Car: Free Play Racing Game
description:
Classic Mafia Car Driving School is a 3D Car Driving & rage Racing Game happening in 2016.

Driving School of Old Vintage Furious Cars is here, Classic Models which Mafia Members used.
Stunning New York City Environment where all the driving and racing takes place.
Classic Mafia Car Driving School 2016 is the latest simulation game where you can learn to drive different kind of vehicles: cars, trucks and buses. Classic Mafia Car Driving School 2016 will allow you to play across new York city environment. these cars will give you driving rage which would be better then any hill road game.
you must had played truck parking, Speed bus, monster truck stunt games but this game is all about old school driving in classic new York city.
Drive & Racing in Mafia Like Era, Show Muscle in this unstoppable speed car racing.
In this game you will learn how to drive by driving luxury cars in the beautiful city. Be ready for a lot of challenging tasks.
Drive to lean the old classic driving in this awesome simulation game.

Classic Mafia Car Driving School is the most realistic car simulator in Google Play !! Are you ready to improve your driving skills? Now you can get it for free !! Earn points and unlock more vehicles to improve your driving skills with Classic Mafia Car Driving School having lots of fun and much more...Are you bore with PARKING game like Car PARKING , Log Truck Parking Bus Parking the download Free Game Mafia Car Driving School.

[Classic Mafia Car Driving School
- Realistic game environment
- 3D graphics
- Precise Controls
- Thrilling game-play experience
